Articles.Content:
No. I'm an alien.

The user below me has a doomsday device idea.

Nop yet

TUBM is a swimmer

Yes. In fact, I did more swimming in the last week than in the previous ten years.

The user below me has hair that reaches their shoulders or longer.

Nope, my hair is short.

The user below me likes SRBs.

Who doesn't?

The user below me would cause an explosion if he/she could do it without no bad consequences.

Of course because boom

the person below likes riddles

No. I prefer answers.

The user below me knows that 10 = 2.

Of course, but you should always specify bases when mixing different ones. 10b = 2d

The user below me doesn't look at explosions. That cool he is.
Nope I stare them because we're the fun of looking away?

Yes.

The user below me knows what was the first man-made object on the Moon was without looking it up.

I feel really ashamed, but I had to confirm with google. Now I'll remember.

The user below me likes his rockets BIG.

A salut,y I like them so big they crashe my computer

the the person below me hates necroposters

Very much so.

The person below me thinks Minecraft is boring.

Negative.

The user below me watched the movie CHAPPiE.

Nope.

The user below me thinks social networking is bad.

Nope. It's a tool, can be used for good or evil.

The user below me has studied linear algebra.

Yes. I even remember some of it!

The user below me likes strawberries.

Eeeeeh.... On occasion, not usually though.

The user below me is in college.

That depends on your definition of "college". If your "college" == "university", then yes.

The user below me has never pet a tiger, but would like to.

Yes! Especially if it's a Siberian tiger, and I can get a picture with it. Preferably in Siberia.

The user below me is scared of clowns.

I am not ^^

The user below me has handled a snake >3' long

That's BS, I've never even touched a snake.

The user below me lives in the US.

False.

user below me is made up of zeroes and ones.

I am error

the user below me knows 3 or more languages (written or spoken) decently

Yes. Ja. Hai. (no japanese keyboard on my phone )

The user below me knows some Japanese.
